name: Hide Firefox Blocked Pop-Up Message
description:
If have Firefox block popup windows and you will not make any exceptions any website, you probably do not want to be bothered by these messages either! With this style you will not see anymore the messages:
Firefox prevented this site from opening a/# pop-up window(s).
additional_info: This only hides the messages. Setting privacy.popups.showBrowserMessage = false in about:config should prevent them from existing.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.mozilla.org/keymaster/gatekeeper/there.is.only.xul);notification[value="popup-blocked"]{display:none !important;}
/* This only hides the messages, setting "privacy.popups.showBrowserMessage = false" in "about:config" should prevent them from existing. */
